text: Festus Gontebanye Mogae (born 21 August 1939) is a Motswana politician. He served as President of Botswana from 1998 to 2008. He succeeded Quett Masire as President in 1998 and was reelected in October 2004. After being president for ten years, he stepped down in 2008 and was succeeded by Lieutenant General Ian Khama."Botswana's Mogae set to retire", AFP (IOL), 15 July 2007. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Botswana Category:Vice presidents of Botswana
title: Festus Mogae
